item.description:
Join us as we march with Ron Paul in the Londonderry Old Home Day Parade.

Bring signs and literature if you have it. The Nashua Meetup Group will have plenty of Banners for you to carry.

Approximately 8,000 spectators line up along the 1.2-mile parade route on Mammoth Road to watch.

The parade route begins at the Londonderry Middle School and ends at Mack's Apples.

We will meet at the school at 10:00am.
It is scheduled to start promptly, RAIN OR SHINE, at 10:30am.

After this event, plan to follow Ron Paul to Strafford to attend the GOP Straw Poll event.
item.name: March with Ron Paul
